import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Redirect } from 'react-router-dom' function LoginForm(props) { const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const [redirect, setRedirect] = useState(false) const [userRole, setUserRole] = useState('') const getRole = async () => { let response = await fetch( process.env.REACT_APP_API + 'setup/GetUserRoles?email=' + email, { headers: { "Accept": '*/*', "Content-Type": "application/json; charset=utf-8", "Accept-Encoding": "gzip, deflate, br" }, credentials: 'include' }); const content = await response.json(); set } const submit = async (event) => { event.preventDefault() await fetch(process.env.REACT_APP_API + 'authmanagement/login', { method: 'POST', headers: { Accept: 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }, credentials: 'include', body: JSON.stringify({ email, password, }), }) .then((res) => res.json()) .then( (result) => { getRole() setRedirect(true) props.setName(result.username) }, (error) => { alert('Failed') }, ) } if (redirect) { return } return (
